si.desc: An ethereal ring of light capable of driving away nightmares
si.lv0: Defense rating is increased by 4% of the value of Athalia's attack rating
si.lv10: Defense rating is increased by 6% of the value of Athalia's attack rating
si.lv20: Defense rating is increased by 8% of the value of Athalia's attack rating
si.lv30: Enemies that attack Athalia will begin to bleed out for 2 seconds (ability cannot be stacked). Enemies will lose health equal to 70% of their attack rating per second and their health recovery rate will be decreased by 70%

fn.lv3: Every time Athalia's allies (excluding Athalia) use their ultimate ability, the damage of their Normal Attacks is increased by 15% until the end of the battle. This ability can be stacked 2 times
fn.lv9: Every time Athalia's allies (excluding Athalia) use their ultimate ability, the damage of their Normal Attacks is increased by 20% until the end of the battle. This ability can be stacked 4 times

si.desc: A pair of headdresses that allow an uncanny connection between the wearers
si.lv0: When Lailah and Elijah are in close proximity to one another, their attack rating will be increased by 5%. When they are far apart from one another, their defense rating will be increased by 15%
si.lv10: When Lailah and Elijah are in close proximity to one another, their attack rating will be increased by 10%. When they are far apart from one another, their defense rating will be increased by 25%
si.lv20: When Elijah's normal attack deals a critical strike to an enemy, the affected enemy's damage towards Lailah will be reduced by 40% for 6 seconds
si.lv30: When Lailah's normal attack deals a critical strike to an enemy, any damage dealt to the affected enemy by Elijah will be increased by 100% for 6 seconds

fn.lv3: If Elijah or Lailah lose a combined amount of health equal to 70% of their max health, they are granted a protective shield that is able to mitigate damage equal to 50% of their max health for 6 seconds
fn.lv9: Shield duration increased to 15 seconds

si.desc: Crafted by the celestial carpenter, Ansiel, this heavenly timepiece has the ability to manipulate the flow of time and even stop it
si.lv0: Reduces the Haste of enemies that get too close to Orthros by 30 points
si.lv10: Reduces the Haste of enemies that get too close to Orthros by 45 points
si.lv20: Reduces the Haste of enemies that get too close to Orthros by 60 points
si.lv30: Enemies that remain too close to Orthros for more than 6 seconds will become frozen in time for 3 seconds

fn.lv3: After using the ability "Time Suspension", the ally with the highest Attack Rating (excluding Orthros) is able to move normally on the battlefield
fn.lv9: Ally's Haste is increased by 35 while moving during "Time Suspension"

si.desc: A powerful and extremely rare stone that was forged within the Core's Cradle. The flame that burns within it can never be extinguished
si.lv0: Talene's Attack Rating is increased by 10% and her Defense Rating is increased by 20% every time she is reborn using her ‘Phoenix Rising' ability
si.lv10: Talene's Attack Rating is increased by 20% and her Defense Rating is increased by 40% every time she is reborn using her ‘Phoenix Rising' ability
si.lv20: Talene immediately recovers 120 energy points each time she is reborn
si.lv30: Talene immediately recovers 400 energy points each time she is reborn

fn.lv3: Talene deals 80% AoE damage per second to nearby enemies while in her 'Fireball' state. 30% of the damage dealt to enemies is converted into Talene's health
fn.lv9: Talene deals 110% AoE damage per second to nearby enemies while in her 'Fireball' state. 60% of the damage dealt to enemies is converted into Talene's health

si.desc: A deceptively heavy and powerful rod that can grow on command. It is said to be capable of injuring and killing almost all beings
si.lv0: Wu Kong gains a 2-layer protective barrier at the start of battles. If Wu Kong is dealt damage that exceeds 10% of his max health he will lose 1 layer and mitigate the damage received
si.lv10: Gains a 4-layer protective barrier at the start of battles
si.lv20: Wu Kong's clones now possess a 1-layer protective barrier
si.lv30: Regains 3 protective barriers each time his ultimate ability is used

fn.lv3: Wu Kong recovers 60 energy points per second when he is absent from the battlefield as a result of his "Cloud Clones" ability. This ability no longer regenerates energy when Wu Kong's energy reaches or exceeds 600 points
fn.lv9: Wu Kong recovers 3% of his max health per second while absent from the battlefield as a result of his "Cloud Clones" ability

si.desc: A magical broomstick that was crafted by the celestial craftsman Ansiel out of a special and rare wood. This unique broomstick is able to bring flowers to blossom and can fly to lofty heights if needed
si.lv0: Reduces an enemy's Haste by 20 points for 4 seconds when the ability "Swoop" deals Critical Damage to an enemy
si.lv10: Reduces an enemy's Haste by 35 points for 4 seconds when the ability "Swoop" deals Critical Damage to an enemy
si.lv20: When Flora's health is above 90%, the cooldown time of her ability "Swoop" is reduced by 250%
si.lv30: Reduces an enemy's Haste by 50 points for 5 seconds when the ability "Swoop" deals Critical Damage to an enemy

fn.lv3: Enemies within range of the ability "Sea of Flowers" ability lose 12 Haste points and allies within range of the "Sea of Flowers" gain 6 Haste points
fn.lv9: Enemies within range of the ability "Sea of Flowers" ability lose 12 Haste points and allies within range of the "Sea of Flowers" gain 24 Haste points

si.desc: Twisted armor that represents the very evil it protects
si.lv0: Enemies with less than 30% health will be stunned for a short period of time
si.lv10: Ezizh's fire lasts for 1 seconds and raises the damage by 15%
si.lv20: Ezizh's fire lasts for 1 seconds and raises the damage by 20%
si.lv30: Increases the duration the ground burns for by 100%. However only one location can be burned at a time

fn.lv3: While using the ability "Feeble Mind", Ezizh receives 25% less damage from enemy attacks and cannot be controlled by enemies
fn.lv9: While using the ability "Feeble Mind", Ezizh receives 60% less damage from enemy attacks and cannot be controlled by enemies

si.desc: A whip, the touch of which enslaves its victims. The tool of a cruel master
si.lv0: When any non-summoned allies lose health, 10% of the health lost will be given to Mehira
si.lv10: When other teammates lose health, 15% of the health lost will be given to Mehira
si.lv20: When other teammates lose health, 20% of the health lost will be given to Mehira
si.lv30: If at full health, any excess healing abilities or effects that Mehira receives will be converted into energy

fn.lv3: Enemies that have dealt damage to Mehira within the last 3 seconds of Mehira using "Whiplash" on one of her allies will receive 25% more damage from said ally during the aforementioned time duration
fn.lv9: Enemies that have dealt damage to Mehira within the last 10 seconds of Mehira using "Whiplash" on one of her allies will receive 30% more damage from said ally during the aforementioned time duration

si.desc: An hourglass that has the ability to change the flow of time, allowing for its holder to go back or forth in time as they please. This hourglass is said to be the embodiment of Zolrath's wretched soul
si.lv0: Damage dealt to enemies with a lower health percentage than Zolrath is increased by 10%
si.lv10: Damage dealt to enemies with a lower health percentage than Zolrath is increased by 25%
si.lv20: Damage dealt to enemies with a lower health percentage than Zolrath is increased by 40%
si.lv30: Damage ignores defense rating and damage immunity effect of enemies that have less than 40% of their max health

fn.lv3: Zolrath delays his enemies' entrance onto the battlefield by 0.75 second(s) and the time prerequisite for his ability "Annihilate" is reduced by 3.75 seconds when this ability is used
fn.lv9: The frequency of Zolrath's Normal Attacks are increased by 50% after using the ability "Annihilate" for a total of 65 seconds

si.desc: Frozen in perpetuity, this object emanates a coldness that is able to cut through bone and steel
si.lv0: Increases the duration of most negative debuff effects which are currently affecting all enemies on the battlefield by 30% seconds
si.lv10: Normal attacks that deal critical damage now have a freezing effect that lasts for 1 seconds
si.lv20: Normal attacks that deal critical damage now have a freezing effect that lasts for 3 seconds
si.lv30: Increases the duration of most negative debuff effects which are currently affecting all enemies on the battlefield by 60% seconds

fn.lv3: When using the ability "Glacial Shards", if a single enemy is struck by 2 shards or more, the target becomes completely frozen for 1.5 seconds
fn.lv9: Any enemies frozen by one of Khazard's abilities will receive 15% more damage

si.desc: Two vicious tools used exclusively to butcher and maim victims that exist as symbol of Mezoth's depravity. It is said many poor souls bear the scars of Mezoth's wrath on their bodies
si.lv0: Hero gains 200 energy points at the start of battles
si.lv10: 25% of damage received is taken by the enemy imprisoned within Mezoth's abdomen
si.lv20: Hero gains 500 energy points at the start of battles
si.lv30: 50% of damage received is taken by the enemy imprisoned within Mezoth's abdomen

fn.lv3: The duration for the majority of de-buffs affecting Mezoth is reduced by 50% when Mezoth's health is above 40%
fn.lv9: The duration for the majority of de-buffs affecting Mezoth is reduced by 50% when Mezoth's health is above 80%

si.desc: A banner bearing the crest of House Rayne. A symbol of their indomitable spirit
si.lv0: Raises all allies' attack ratings by 5% and defense ratings by 10% for every non- summoned enemy that falls in combat while Estrilda is alive up until the end of the battle. This ability may be stacked up to 3 times
si.lv10: Raises attack rating by 7.5% and defense rating by 15% every time the ability is used
si.lv20: Raises attack rating by 10% and defense rating by 20% every time the ability is used
si.lv30: Restores 80 energy to all allies when ability is used

fn.lv3: After the first 18 seconds of battles, if all allies are still alive, all non-summoned allies will have their Attack Ratings increased by 10% and Defense Ratings increased by 20% until the end of the battles
fn.lv9: Ability may be activated after 12 seconds of battle

si.desc: A holy artifact imbued with radiant essence
si.lv0: All allies that are receiving the effects of the ability "Blessing" will have a 40% chance to activate the "Divine Retribution" ability. This ability can be activated up to 3 times every 5 seconds. Damage dealt by this ability is equal to 40% of the ability’s original damage when used by allies
si.lv10: Raises potency of "Divine Retribution's" damage when used by allies up to 60%
si.lv20: Raises potency of "Divine Retribution's" damage when used by allies up to 80%
si.lv30: Restores 40 energy each time ability is used

fn.lv3: When the ability "Divine Light" only hits 1 enemy target, the damage dealt to the target is increased by 30%
fn.lv9: When Belinda deals damage to an enemy, their Crit Resistance is reduced by 35 points for 3 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked

si.desc: A pair of reliable old blasters. Good for gettings into and out of sticky situations
si.lv0: Raine locks onto the ally with the highest ATK points, allowing them to recover health and energy every 2 seconds. The amount of health and energy recovered every 2 seconds is equal to 30% of Raine's own recovery rate
si.lv10: Ally recovers 50% health or energy
si.lv20: When either Raine or the ally she is locked onto uses their ultimate abilities, both her and her ally will receive a shield that is able to reduce damage equal to 100% of her own attack rating
si.lv30: Value of shield is increased to 180% of attack rating value

fn.lv3: The maximum damage cap for the ability "Exploit" is increased by 5%
fn.lv9: The maximum damage cap for the ability "Exploit" is increased by 10%

si.desc: An enchanted casket containing a horde of malicious spirits
si.lv0: Raises the defense ratings of all allied heroes by 5% for 5 seconds if they possess more than 60% of their max energy. Affected allies are also impervious to control abilities
si.lv10: Defense rating is increased up to 20%
si.lv20: Defense rating is increased up to 40%
si.lv30: Haste is increased for 8 seconds

fn.lv3: If Fawkes or any of his allies have a Factional Advantage over any of their enemies, their Factional Advantage damage bonus will be increased by 8%
fn.lv9: The majority of the enemy's buff effects are removed when successfully struck by Fawkes' Normal Attacks

si.desc: A blessed shield that remains unscathed after a hundred battles
si.lv0: Enemy heroes have their energy recovery effects reduced by 30% for 4 seconds when they are struck by the ability "Divine Strike" or if a normal attack becomes a critical strike
si.lv10: Enemy heroes have their energy recovery effects reduced by 60% for 4 seconds
si.lv20: Enemy heroes have their energy recovery effects reduced by 90% for 4 seconds
si.lv30: Removes the majority of the enemy's buffs when used

fn.lv3: Using the "Blessed Shield" ability while positioned on the frontline reduces the damage that Lucius other frontline ally receives by 30%
fn.lv9: Using the "Blessed Shield" ability while positioned on the frontline reduces the damage that Lucius other frontline ally receives by 75%

si.desc: Swift, light, and sharp. Always seems to find the right spot
si.lv0: Thane's damage is increased by 20% if he does not receive damage for 3 seconds
si.lv10: Damage increased to 30% when requirements are met
si.lv20: Damage increased to 40% when requirements are met
si.lv30: If Thane's target enemy does not inflict damage upon Thane for 3 seconds, then Thane's damage will be increased

fn.lv3: Thane's ability "Eviscerate" has a 100% chance to hit an enemy the first time it is used against them, and deals additional damage to the target equal to 18% of their max health. The additional damage dealt by this ability cannot exceed 360% of Thane's own Attack Rating
fn.lv9: The default number of attacks for the ability "Eviscerate" is raised by 6 attacks

si.desc: A pair of tower shields that when brought together form an unbreakable wall
si.lv0: At the beginning of battles Hendrik's max health is increased by 300% of his attack rating. The max health increase will not affect the proportion of health that Hendrik already possesses
si.lv10: At the beginning of battles Hendrik's max health is increased by 600% of his attack rating. The max health increase will not affect the proportion of health that Hendrik already possesses
si.lv20: All of Hendrik's attacks now do additional damage that is equal to 2% of his max health
si.lv30: At the beginning of battles Hendrik's max health is increased by 1000% of his attack rating. The max health increase will not affect the proportion of health that Hendrik already possesses

fn.lv3: Increases the Defense Rating an allied hero that is positioned above Hendrik in the formation by 25% of Hendrik's own Defense Rating value
fn.lv9: Increases the Defense Rating an allied hero that is positioned above Hendrik in the formation by 60% of Hendrik's own Defense Rating value

si.desc: A bell that seems to bring good fortune with its cheerful ring
si.lv0: After entering the battle Rowan will set up a stall that now includes an energy potion. When an ally’s energy is above 600 points they will drink a potion, replenishing 60 energy points. The energy potion will be replenished each time the stall is set up
si.lv10: Energy restored increased to 120 points
si.lv20: Energy restored increased to 200 points
si.lv30: Energy restored increased to 400 points

fn.lv3: When using the health potions from the ability "Healthy Supplies", allied heroes will additionally regenerate 10 of their own max health per second over 1% seconds. This ability cannot be stacked
fn.lv9: When using the health potions from the ability "Healthy Supplies", allied heroes will additionally regenerate 15 of their own max health per second over 1.2% seconds. This ability cannot be stacked

si.desc: As tall as a person, this longbow requires great strength and accuracy to be used efficiently. The bow gets its name due to the high velocity of its arrows, which are said to be as fast as a shooting star
si.lv0: Attack Rating is raised to 10% when in close proximity to allied heroes
si.lv10: Attack rating is raised to 20%
si.lv20: Gwyneth fires two arrows in quick succession when she or a nearby ally uses their ultimate ability
si.lv30: Attack rating is raised to 30%

fn.lv3: Normal Attack triggers the abilities "Flaming Arrow" and "Lightning Arrow" simultaneously. The damage for this attack is also increased by 15%
fn.lv9: "Flaming Arrow" and "Lightning Arrow" are triggered following the death of any non-summoned enemies. The damage for this attack is also increased by 15%

si.desc: An extraordinary broom which has a mind of its own, brought to life by Rosaline
si.lv0: Rosaline raises the attack and defense ratings of the ally she is currently following for 8% of her own ratings' values
si.lv10: Attack and defense ratings are raised by 16% of Rosaline's own rating values
si.lv20: Attack and defense ratings are raised by 30% of Rosaline's own rating values
si.lv30: Raises ally's crit rating and dodge for 25% of Rosaline's own rating values

fn.lv3: As Rosaline is following an ally around the battlefield, she manifests 'Tea Cup' that she throws at the enemy. This ability is triggered once every 2.5 seconds. The effects of this ability are identical to the "Crazy Crockery" ability
fn.lv9: Ability is triggered once every 0.75 seconds

si.desc: A divine book that contains prayers used to exorcise demonic spirits and drive away evil
si.lv0: All allied heroes including Cecilia recover 200 energy points and a total equivalent of 150% worth of Cecilia's attack rating as health over 5 seconds whenever the ability "Judgement Day" kills an enemy in less than 5 seconds
si.lv10: Allied heroes including Cecilia recover 200 energy points and a total equivalent of 250% worth of Cecilia's attack rating as health
si.lv20: Allied heroes including Cecilia recover 300 energy points and a total equivalent of 250% worth of Cecilia's attack rating as health
si.lv30: Cecilia's Health Recovery Rate is increased by an additional 50%

fn.lv3: After every 4 seconds, Cecilia marks the enemy that has dealt the most damage with 1 Symbol(s) of Sin
fn.lv9: Using the ultimate ability "Judgement Day" marks the enemy with the second highest dealt damage with a Symbol of Sin

si.desc: Crafted out of sawtooth oak from the dark forest, this barrel possesses unique magical attributes that makes its contents all the more tasty
si.lv0: Rigby's "Fire Breath" ability will trigger an additional explosion on enemies currently set alight by the ability "Barrel Bomb", resulting in 180% damage being dealt to them
si.lv10: Damage increased by up to 210%
si.lv20: Damage increased by up to 250%
si.lv30: Explosions cause enemies to be knocked down and stunned for 3 seconds

fn.lv3: Using the ability "Drunken Frenzy" causes the ally with the lowest Attack Rating to also enter a state of frenzy. The frenzied state can be stacked multiple times. Each stacked layer of 'frenzy' reduces the damage the ally receives by 25%. Once this ability has been stacked 8 times, its effects will cease
fn.lv9: Once 'frenzy' has been stacked 3 times, the ally immediately recovers a value of health equal to 35% of Rigby's max health

si.desc: A beautifully crafted, yet deadly knife that is as sophisticated as its owner. Able to slice through all types of meat with ease, few people are worthy of owning such a tool
si.lv0: If an enemy appears on the allied side of the battlefield, Oscar instantaneously appears beside them and proceeds to kick them back into their own half of the battlefield, resulting in 200% damage being dealt to the enemy
si.lv10: Ability converts 100% of damage taken by the enemy into health
si.lv20: Damaged increased by up to 300%
si.lv30: Ability possesses a stun effect which lasts for 5 seconds

fn.lv3: Every time Oscar moves locations due to his abilities increases his Dodge by 60 points for 5 seconds. The length of time that this ability lasts for is calculated individually each time it is used. This ability can be stacked multiple times
fn.lv9: The ability "Slice and Dice" is used continuously up until there are no knives left next to any enemies

si.desc: A weapon so named because anything is weak against it
si.lv0: Restores 15% of Brutus' max health after the ability "Last Gasp" is used
si.lv10: 30% of max HP is restored
si.lv20: Last Gasp is extended for 1 second
si.lv30: Once the effects of the ability "Last Gasp" have ceased Brutus receives an additional shield that is able to mitigate damage equal to 50% of his max health, which lasts for 5 seconds

fn.lv3: The duration of the ability "Last Gasp" is extended by 2 seconds
fn.lv9: The ability "Last Gasp" is extended by 2 seconds for each non-summoned ally that dies before or during the use of it

si.desc: The axes used by Khasos to fell a Mauler chieftain in ritual combat
si.lv0: Increases the chance of Khasos catching his battle axe when using his "Throwing Axe" ability by 75%. After catching the axe Khasos will then immediately use his "Throwing Axe" ability again, however the chance to catch the axe again will then be reduced by 25% up until Khasos is no longer able to catch it and the ability is reset
si.lv10: Chance to catch axe increased to 80%
si.lv20: 30% of axe damage is converted into health
si.lv30: Chance to catch axe increased to 100%

fn.lv3: Each living frontline ally increases Khasos' Crit Amplification by 25 points when he is positioned on the backline
fn.lv9: Each living backline enemy reduces the damage Khasos receives by 22% when he is positioned on the frontline

si.desc: A crossbow, accurate and light. Perfect for a skulking kill or cunning ambush
si.lv0: Vurk’s "Mania" ability now fires 3 crossbow bolts per aftack, however the additional bolts will deal 80% damage
si.lv10: Additional crossbow bolt damage increased to 100% damage
si.lv20: Additional crossbow bolt damage increased to 120% damage
si.lv30: The "Mania" ability now fires 5 crossbow bolts per attack

fn.lv3: Vurk's Normal Attacks and "Mania" ability deal 35% more damage to enemies that have been poisoned by his own abilities
fn.lv9: Prolongs the duration of time an enemy is poisoned for by 1 seconds when Vurk uses a Normal Attack or his "Mania" ability

si.desc: A mask that acts as a window to another world
si.lv0: At the beginning of the battle Numisu sets down an offensive totem at center of the battlefield
si.lv10: At the beginning of the battle Numisu sets down a rejuvenating totem behind his own team’s backline
si.lv20: The health of Numisu's totems is increased by 40%
si.lv30: The health of Numisu's totems is increased by 100%

fn.lv3: Ultimate "Voodoo Blessing" heals more and summons 2 more totems, which take their normal effects
fn.lv9: Numisu's ultimate "Voodoo Blessing" additionally heals the weakest 1 unhealed allies, as well as up to 4 of his totems

si.desc: A cavalry spear crafted from the jaw of a demon lord. Inflicts wicked wounds
si.lv0: The ability "Beast of Burden" will no longer drain energy for the first 5 seconds after each time it is used
si.lv10: Only requires 500 energy to activate ultimate ability for the first time
si.lv20: Energy that is recovered when injured is increased by 50%
si.lv30: Only requires 200 energy to activate ultimate ability for the first time

fn.lv3: All allied heroes within the enemy half of the battlefield have their Attack Ratings increased by 20% and also receive 25% less damage from enemy attacks
fn.lv9: Allied heroes recover 100 energy points after every 3 seconds in the enemy's half of the battlefield

si.desc: Heavy vambraces well suited to a wild and brutish fighting style
si.lv0: When Warek’s "Carnal Rage" ability cannot be stacked any further, he will recover 3% health per second over 15 seconds
si.lv10: Ability restores 4% of max health per second
si.lv20: Ability restores 5% of max health per second
si.lv30: Stacks Warek’s "Carnal Rage" buff effects once every 2 seconds. Once the effects can no longer be stacked, his attack rating will be increased by an additional 0.7% per second

fn.lv3: If one of Warek's Normal Attacks or abilities strikes 2 enemies or more, then his Crit Rating is increased by 40% and his Crit Amplification is increased by 45 points for this attack
fn.lv9: Warek has a 100% chance to hit his enemies when there are 2 or more heroes within range of Warek's Normal Attacks or skills

si.desc: Ideal arms for a lethal mix of flurried offense and lightning quick defense
si.lv0: When Antandra's health falls below 30% she activates this ability, allowing herself to recover 10% of her max health per second over 30 seconds. This ability may only be used once per battle
si.lv10: Ability restores 15% of max health per second
si.lv20: Ability restores 20% of max health per second
si.lv30: Ability can be used twice per battle with an interval of 8 seconds between uses

fn.lv3: Antandra receives 40% less damage from enemies that are out of range of her "Knockdown" ability
fn.lv9: If Antandra loses a total of 110% of her max health, her Attack Rating is increased by 45% and she recovers 50 energy points per second and is also immune to enemy control abilities until the end of the battle

si.desc: A large scepter with a radiant design symbolizing absolute power
si.lv0: 1% of Safiya's total damage output is converted into her attack rating. The attack rating can be increased up to a total of 140%
si.lv10: 2% of Safiya's total damage output is converted into her attack rating
si.lv20: 3% of Safiya's total damage output is converted into her attack rating
si.lv30: Safiya will use "Scattered Bolt" instead of normal attacks once the attack rating increase has reached its maximum percentage

fn.lv3: Duration of the "Spectral Disruption" is increased by 15 seconds
fn.lv9: The focusing stage of the ultimate ability "Falling Sun" is sped up by 40 % while "Spectral Disruption" is still present on the battlefield

si.desc: A crystal that is able to absorb fire. This jewel is sometimes unable to contain the power held within, resulting in a very deadly aftermath
si.lv0: If Satrana is slain, her "Fireseeds" ability will be triggered when the enemy's health is below 50% and its damage will be increased by 70%
si.lv10: Energy that is recovered when injured or attacking is increased by 20%
si.lv20: Energy that is recovered when injured or attacking is increased by 40%
si.lv30: Only requires 250 energy to activate ultimate ability for the first time

fn.lv3: If the ability "Overflow" causes the total duration an enemy has been set alight for to exceed 15 seconds, the burning effects of "Overflow" are strengthened. Enemies may not recover any health while being burned as a result of "Overflow" and the damage output of this ability is raised to 2 times its original value
fn.lv9: Burning effects of "Overflow" are strengthened when the enemy has been set alight for a total of 9 seconds

si.desc: Two vicious-looking blades that have been the demise of many unfortunate gladiators. Crafted to perfection, they were built with only one intention in mind, death
si.lv0: Reduces all damage that Tidus receives by 40% for the first 6 seconds after "Savagery" is used
si.lv10: Reduces 60% of all damage received
si.lv20: Reduces 70% of all damage received
si.lv30: Tidus is impervious to all enemy control abilities for the first 6 seconds after "Savagery" is used

fn.lv3: Tenacity is raised by 12 points during battle
fn.lv9: If Tidus kills an enemy or is close to an enemy that is killed, he will recover 35% of the health which has already been lost

si.desc: One wonders how a small Durri is able to wreak such havoc. The answer: The Ivory Piercer. Crafted from the horns of a powerful iron-jaw beast, this weapon is light but also extremely durable. You don't want to be on the wrong end of this powerful weapon
si.lv0: After using his Ultimate ability, Drez receives a shield which is able to mitigate damage worth 400% of his Attack Rating value for a duration of 5 seconds. This ability can be activated 2 times per battle
si.lv10: Value of shield is increased to 600% of Attack Rating Value
si.lv20: Ability can be used up to 4 times per battle
si.lv30: Value of shield is increased to 800% of Attack Rating Value

fn.lv3: Every time the abilities "Deadly Ambush" or "Bloody Evisceration" are used, Drez's Attack Speed will be increased by 80 points for a duration of 2 seconds
fn.lv9: Every time the abilities "Deadly Ambush" or "Bloody Evisceration" are used, Drez's Attack Speed will be increased by 150 points for a duration of 3 seconds

si.desc: A powerful scepter that symbolizes wisdom and power. Only the true Mauler chieftain may wield it
si.lv0: Each time Skriath deals a Critical Strike to an enemy target, large rocks fall down on them, dealing 50% AoE damage to them and any nearby enemies. This ability is unable to deal critical damage itself and can only target the same enemy once every 3 seconds
si.lv10: Damage increased by up to 70%
si.lv20: Damage increased by up to 90%
si.lv30: During a "Sandstorm", all enemies are dealt 2% of their current health value per second as damage, ignoring all enemy Defense Ratings

fn.lv3: At the beginning of battles, enemies positioned at the top and bottom positions of the enemy formation's backline are pulled closer towards the center backline enemy hero by a desert vortex
fn.lv9: When "Sandstorm" weather conditions are occurring, allies that have the wind behind them have their movement speed increased by 150%. Enemies that are fighting against the direction of the wind have their movement speed decreased by 75%

si.desc: Hefty and colossal, this horn of war has been left scarred by the many battles it was used in. Once again it call shall be heard, ushering in a new era of war
si.lv0: This ability raises Anoki's attack rating by 4% for every non-summoned ally that is standing near him and raises his Defnese Rating by 10% for every enemy standing near him
si.lv10: This ability raises Anoki's attack rating by 8% for every non-summoned ally that is standing near him and raises his Defnese Rating by 15% for every enemy standing near him
si.lv20: Excluding summoned entities, when there are more than a total of 3 characters on the battlefied (includes enemies and allies), Anoki recovers 5% of his max health per second and becomes immune to control abilities
si.lv30: This ability raises Anoki's attack rating by 12% for every non-summoned ally that is standing near him and raises his Defnese Rating by 20% for every enemy standing near him

fn.lv3: Anoki uses his "Horn of War" ability again 15 seconds after its initial use. "Horn of War" can be used up to 2 times per battle. Each time the ability is used, the shield that it generates will become 50% weaker than the previous shield
fn.lv9: Anoki uses his "Horn of War" ability again 15 seconds after its initial use. "Horn of War" can be used up to 3 times per battle. Each time the ability is used, the shield that it generates will become 70% weaker than the previous shield

si.desc: A sharp spear that can cast natural magic. Ideal for any defender of the forest
si.lv0: Normal attacks heal Nemora's weakest ally for 60% of her own attack rating
si.lv10: Healing effect is raised by 75% if a critical strike occurs when using a normal attack
si.lv20: Health recovery increased by up to 90% of Attack Rating
si.lv30: Health recovery increased by up to 120% of Attack Rating

fn.lv3: When Nemora's health falls below 60 % for the first time, she will use her "Life Force" ability on herself
fn.lv9: The first time an enemy gets close to Nemora, she activates the effects of her "Beguile" ability against all nearby enemies

si.desc: Blades as deadly as the night time assassin herself
si.lv0: At the beginning of the battle Kaz raises her Dodge by 100 points and Crit Rating by 40 points. The increased attributes will gradually decrease over 20 seconds until they return to normal
si.lv10: Increased attributes will decrease over 40 seconds until returning to normal
si.lv20: Kaz's chance to dodge magic attacks are increased by 1% for every 16 Dodge points that she gains. Chance to dodge magic attacks can be raised to a maximum of 25%
si.lv30: Kaz's chance to dodge magic attacks are increased by 1% for every 14 Dodge points that she gains. Chance to dodge magic attacks can be raised to a maximum of 50%

fn.lv3: Enemies that are dealt damage are poisoned. Poisoned enemies have their Accuracy reduced by 60 points and also lose 70% worth of Kaz's Attack Rating value as health every second over a duration of 4 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked
fn.lv9: Enemies have their Energy Recovery rates reduced by 50% while poisoned. (Also affects abilities that modify Energy Recovery rates)

si.desc: A gift that fell from the sky. Rains destruction in the same way
si.lv0: Increases all allies' accuracy by 40 while Lyca is alive
si.lv10: Increases all allies' accuracy by 70 while Lyca is alive
si.lv20: Raises the damage dealt to the enemy target by 0.2% for every accuracy point that is higher than the enemy's max dodge points and can be raised up to a maximum of 20% damage. (Ability affects all allies excluding mages)
si.lv30: Increases all allies' accuracy by 100 while Lyca is alive

fn.lv3: Targets the nearest 2 enemies with "Rapid Arrows" the first time the ability is used
fn.lv9: Every Normal Attack targets the nearest 2 enemies simultaneously

si.desc: An ethereal ring of light capable of driving away nightmares
si.lv0: Reduces the attack rating of nearby enemies by 10% after Tasi uses her "Teleportation" ability
si.lv10: The scope of the reduced attack rating effect is increased up to 15%
si.lv20: The scope of the reduced attack rating effect is increased up to 20%
si.lv30: The scope of the reduced attack rating effect is increased up to 30%

fn.lv3: If Tasi is attacked within 1.5 seconds of using her ability "Teleportation", the ability will be instantly triggered again
fn.lv9: Cooldown for the ability "Teleportation" is reduced by 1 seconds

si.desc: Strange carved designs that glow with ancient power
si.lv0: Ulmus' own health recovery effects are increased by 10%
si.lv10: Ulmus' own health recovery effects are increased by 20%
si.lv20: After using the ability "Deep Roots" Ulmus' health recovery effect is increased by an additional 10%
si.lv30: After using the ability "Deep Roots" Ulmus' health recovery effect is increased by an additional 20%

fn.lv3: Allies close to enemies that are afflicted by Ulmus "Writhing Roots" ability are granted the positive effects of his "Forest's Oath" ability
fn.lv9: The value of the shield granted by "Forest's Oath" is increased by 100%

si.desc: A fearsome weapon with the power of crashing waves
si.lv0: At the beginning of battles Seirus will cause his own max health to increase by 40%, however his current health after the increase will not be at maximum unless restored
si.lv10: At the beginning of battles Seirus will recover 2% of his max health per second over 40 seconds
si.lv20: The value of Seirus' max health increase is raised to 70%
si.lv30: The value of Seirus' max health increase is raised to 100%

fn.lv3: After an enemy has been knocked to the edge of the battlefield, Seirus uses his "Deluge" ability against them. Ability may only be used against the same enemy once every 10 seconds
fn.lv9: Ability may be used once every 4 seconds

si.desc: Elegant weapons and elemental conduits. Can project and direct wind
si.lv0: The ability "Elemental Surge" has a chance to cause enemies to become frozen for 2 seconds. The chances of an enemy being frozen are raised if the enemy is already suffering from attack speed reductions, and enemies which are already frozen will no longer be knocked back by the ability
si.lv10: Damage for the ability "Elemental Surge" is increased against frozen enemies by 30%
si.lv20: Damage for the ability "Elemental Surge" is increased against frozen enemies by 50%
si.lv30: Time enemies are frozen is increased to 4 seconds

fn.lv3: The ability "Sylvan Oath" is triggered when Eironn's health is above 60%
fn.lv9: Damage dealt by "Sylvan Oath" when triggered is increased by 15%

si.desc: Made from an incredibly hard substance, this hammer can bring down a fortress
si.lv0: Increases the efficacy of all shields by 25%
si.lv10: Increases the efficacy of all shields by 50%
si.lv20: If the shield created by the ability "Shell Shield" is not broken within a certain period of time, the remaining shield value will be converted into energy. Ability restores up to 250 energy points
si.lv30: When in a shielded state, Gorvo will recover 5% of his max health every second

fn.lv3: Using the ability "Shell Shock" grants Gorvo a shield that is able to mitigate damage equal to 24% of his max health for 3.5 seconds
fn.lv9: Shield duration increased to 8 seconds

si.desc: A staff gifted to Lorsan by the wise old sage, Arden. Although simple and unadorned, this staff is abound with a great natural power
si.lv0: When an enemy linked by the "Gale Force" ability dies, Lorsan will receive a permanent Haste increase until the end of the battle
si.lv10: When an enemy linked by the "Gale Force" ability dies, Lorsan will receive a permanent 90 Haste increase until the end of the battle
si.lv20: When an enemy linked by the "Gale Force" ability dies, Lorsan will be immune to all damage for 4 seconds
si.lv30: When an enemy linked by the "Gale Force" ability is afflicted by negative spells or effects, the other linked enemy will also suffer the same fate

fn.lv3: Lorsan grants an ally with 30 additional Dodge points when their Haste exceeds 50 points
fn.lv9: Lorsan grants an ally with 60 additional Dodge points when their Haste exceeds 50 points

si.desc: Crafted by the finest Wilder weaponsmith and enchanted by the most powerful enchanter in Esperia, this rare two-headed spear is brimming with the powerful arcane forces of the forest. Only the most proficient of warriors are capable of utilizing such perfection
si.lv0: When the ability "tenacity" can no longer be stacked any further, Saurus will recover 40% worth of his own Attack Rating as health every second
si.lv10: When the ability "tenacity" can no longer be stacked any further, Saurus will recover 70% worth of his own Attack Rating as health every second
si.lv20: When the ability "tenacity" can no longer be stacked any further, Saurus will recover 100% worth of his own Attack Rating as health every second
si.lv30: When the ability "tenacity" can no longer be stacked any further, Saurus' allies will recover 150% worth of his Attack Rating as health every time the abilities "War Strike" or "Burst Strikes" are used without being interrupted

fn.lv3: Saurus receives 10% less damage from enemies when using his "Burst Strikes" or "War Strike" abilities
fn.lv9: Saurus receives 25% less damage from enemies when using his "Burst Strikes" or "War Strike" abilities

si.desc: Woven together with a magical material, this cloak is more powerful than it appears. Wearing it allows one to forge a powerful connection with the forest's flora
si.lv0: The Floral Specter will attack 2 enemies simultaneously
si.lv10: The Floral Specter gains an additional 20% health
si.lv20: The Floral Specter gains an additional 50% health
si.lv30: The Floral Specter will attack 3 enemies simultaneously

fn.lv3: When the Floral Specter is defated or its duration on the battlefield expires, it transforms itself into a spirit form that becomes impervious to all attacks for 8 seconds. When "Blossom Fall" is occurring, the spirit is able to attack enemies, however, its damage output is decreased by 15%
fn.lv9: While Solise is alive, if an allied hero that is positioned on the frontline is defeated, a Floral Specter will appear at that allied hero's position

si.desc: A cruel pair of blades, especially effective against other undead
si.lv0: Summons 1 skeletal warrior every 9 seconds behind the enemy closest to the edge of the battlefield while Grezhul is alive
si.lv10: Grezhul recovers 10% of his max health when the skeletal warrior dies
si.lv20: 20% of max HP is restored after resurrection
si.lv30: Skeletal warrior is summoned once every 7.5 seconds

fn.lv3: Value of Grezhul's "Shadow Shield" is increased by 150%. Shield explodes when the ability ends if it has not already been destroyed
fn.lv9: When used, the effects of "Shadow Shield" are granted to up to 2 of Grezhul's summoned Skeletal Warriors

si.desc: A cursed orb containing a trapped spirit. Inspires dread in those who look upon it
si.lv0: The "Tortured Souls" ability deals 12% damage when there is 1 enemy on the battlefield, 6% when there are 2 enemies on the battlefield and 3% damage when there are 3 enemies on the battlefield
si.lv10: The "Tortured Souls" ability deals 24% damage when there is 1 enemy on the battlefield, 12% when there are 2 enemies on the battlefield and 6% damage when there are 3 enemies on the battlefield
si.lv20: The "Tortured Souls" ability deals 36% damage when there is 1 enemy on the battlefield, 18% when there are 2 enemies on the battlefield and 9% damage when there are 3 enemies on the battlefield
si.lv30: The "Tortured Souls" ability deals 48% damage when there is 1 enemy on the battlefield, 24% when there are 2 enemies on the battlefield and 12% damage when there are 3 enemies on the battlefield

fn.lv3: When Shemira's energy is full, she becomes immune to all control abilities for 2 seconds and immediately uses her ultimate ability. This ability can be activated even while another ability is currently in use
fn.lv9: When Shemira's health falls below 50 %, the percentage of damage that is converted into health while her "Tortured Souls" ability is in effect is raised by 30%. Once "Tortured Souls" has finished dealing damage to enemies, the percentage of damage converted into her health falls by 30%

si.desc: The royal symbol of a fallen king. Imbued with spite at the treachery he suffered
si.lv0: Thoran cannot be killed during the initial focusing phase of his "Retaliation" ability
si.lv10: Thoran's max health is increased by 15% while in battle
si.lv20: Thoran's max health is increased by 30% while in battle
si.lv30: Thoran cannot be killed in battle for the first two times that he enters the focusing phase of his "Retaliation" ability

fn.lv3: Enemies that are stunned by the ability "Resurrection" are drawn towards Thoran
fn.lv9: Thoran immediately recovers 150 energy points after he is brought back to life by his "Resurrection" ability

si.desc: A mysterious, cursed book filled with arcane knowledge and perhaps its own will
si.lv0: Each time the ability "Void Barrage" has been successfully cast 3 times it will release 2 bolts of lightning that will each target different enemies
si.lv10: Casting speed is increased by 20%
si.lv20: Casting speed is increased by 30%
si.lv30: Each time the ability "Void Barrage" has been successfully cast 3 times it will release 3 bolts of lightning that will each target different enemies

fn.lv3: "Void Barrage" is used as Isabella's Normal Attack
fn.lv9: Damage dealt by "Void Barrage" is increased by 15%

si.desc: Cruel and graceless. Crafted for butchery and slaughter
si.lv0: When Nara discovers an enemy injured enough to be slain by her ultimate ability, she will attempt to use "Impale" to bring them closer to her before using her ultimate ability to finish them off
si.lv10: The ability "Butchery" will possess an additional 12% life leech effect that is based on the ability’s damage output
si.lv20: The ability "Butchery" will possess an additional 12% life leech effect that is based on the ability’s damage output
si.lv30: When Nara’s health drops below 50%, her "Butchery" ability will no longer require her enemies' health to be below a certain percentage in order for it to deal high amounts of damage

fn.lv3: All enemies become terrified for 2 seconds after Nara successfully kills an enemy hero with her ultimate ability "Butchery". Enemies are unable to attack while terrified and will run away from Nara
fn.lv9: If the requirements for the "Butchery" ability's high damage multipliers are met, its damage will be additionally increased by 450%

si.desc: A bow housing a greedy spirit now tormented by desperate hunger
si.lv0: Normal attacks will cause an evil spirit to haunt the enemy target if a critical strike occurs
si.lv10: Attack ratings for all enemies are reduced by 1.5% and health recovery rates are reduced by 10% for every spirit that is haunting an enemy on the battlefield. This ability may be stacked up to 5 times
si.lv20: Attack ratings for all enemies are reduced by 1.5% and health recovery rates are reduced by 10% for every spirit that is haunting an enemy on the battlefield. This ability may be stacked up to 5 times
si.lv30: Attack ratings for all enemies are reduced by 3% and health recovery rates are reduced by 10% for every spirit that is haunting an enemy on the battlefield. This ability may be stacked up to 8 times

fn.lv3: Ferael's Normal Attacks deal 12% more damage and cause targets to lose 12 Haste points for every 1 spirit that is haunting them for a duration of 1.5 seconds
fn.lv9: Enemies haunted by 3 spirits are stunned and no longer have their Haste reduced by Normal Attacks

si.desc: A cruel, necrotic weapon that causes festering wounds nearly impossible to heal
si.lv0: A cruel, necrotic weapon that causes festering wounds nearly impossible to heal
si.lv10: All of Baden's phantoms have their health increased by 15%
si.lv20: All of Baden's phantoms have their health increased by 30%
si.lv30: Each time a total of 3 phantom Badens disappear from the battlefield, Baden will initiate the effects of his "Phantom Strike"

fn.lv3: When one of Baden's phantoms disappears from the battlefield, the remaining phantoms regain 45% of the health they have already lost
fn.lv9: If Baden receives fatal damage, he consumes one of his phantoms that currently has a higher health percentage than himself and transfers 60% of the phantom's remaining health to himself. This ability can be used 6 times per battle

si.desc: A strange creation. As much a tool for reaping as a weapon for fighting
si.lv0: When any non-summoned allies which are within 20 levels of Kelthur's own level are defeated, Kelthur's attack rating will be increased by 20%
si.lv10: Increases Attack Rating by 28%
si.lv20: Increases Attack Rating by 36%
si.lv30: If 3 allied heroes have already died, Kelthur will increase his life leech attributes by 50 points for 10 seconds

fn.lv3: Kelthur is able to proactively trigger the ability "Retaliation" while the ability "Ethereal Resurgence" is in effect. Cooldown time of "Retaliation" is equal to the ability's regular passive interval time
fn.lv9: "Retaliation" cooldown time is reduced by 2 seconds

si.desc: The key to the void. This unearthly object is capable of opening doors to dark, unknown planes of existence
si.lv0: Each time an enemy uses their ultimate ability against Oden, Oden will retaliate against them with his "Void Lightning" ability. Damage dealt is equal to 60% of the original "Void Lightning" ability's damage output
si.lv10: Damage dealt is equal to 90% of the original "Void Lightning" ability's damage output
si.lv20: Oden retaliates with "Void Lightning" even if he is slain by the enemy's ultimate abilty
si.lv30: Damage dealt is equal to 120% of the original "Void Lightning" ability's damage output

fn.lv3: Every time an enemy uses ultimate ability, Oden will have his attack rating increased by 3% and damage received reduced by 3% until battle ends. The ability effect can be stacked up to 15 times. Once the skill has been stacked 12 times, Oden becomes immune to control abilities
fn.lv9: This effect will apply to another ally hero with the highest combat rating at the same time

si.desc: A weapon built with the prime purpose of impaling its victims, it contains a powerful chemical agent that is capable of turning the gentlest of souls into unbridled killing machines
si.lv0: When Izold uses "Toxic Transfusion" he will also receive the effects of his "Hypodermic Healing" ability
si.lv10: The damage Izold receives is reduced by 30% for 15 seconds when any enemies are slain while Izold is using his "Toxic Transfusion" ability
si.lv20: The damage Izold receives is reduced by 50% for 15 seconds when any enemies are slain while Izold is using his "Toxic Transfusion" ability
si.lv30: Izold cannot be controlled while using his "Toxic Transfusion" ability

fn.lv3: Izold's Attack Rating is increased by 1% and his attack frequency increased by 3% until the end of the battle every time he loses 1% of his max health
fn.lv9: The effects of the ability "Hypodermic Healing" become permanent after this ability has been stacked 45 times and does not need to be manually activated again

si.desc: A deadly blade that slices through flesh like a hot knife through butter
si.lv0: Every time Torne forms a bone whip, his Attack Rating is increased by 10% and his Defense Rating is increased by 20% up until the battle ends. This ability can be stacked 6 times
si.lv10: Every time Torne forms a bone whip, his Attack Rating is increased by 15% and his Defense Rating is increased by 30% up until the battle ends. This ability can be stacked 6 times
si.lv20: Every time Torne forms a bone whip, his Attack Rating is increased by 20% and his Defense Rating is increased by 40% up until the battle ends. This ability can be stacked 6 times
si.lv30: After forming his bone whip a total of 3 times, Torne gains 35 Life Leech points and is immune to control abilities until the end of battle

fn.lv3: Torne is granted a shield that is able to mitigate damage equal to 18% of his max health, which lasts for 5 seconds every time Torne loses 40% of his max health
fn.lv9: Torne is granted a shield that is able to mitigate damage equal to 28% of his max health, which lasts for 10 seconds every time Torne loses 40% of his max health

si.desc: A small soft-toy that goes by the name "Stitchy", stitched together by Daimon's mother with the leftover parts of fabric from her tailer shop. Infused with a soul, Stitchy never leaver his owner's side, and now acts as his guardian protector
si.lv0: After using the ability "Blood Shield", while the shield is still in use, Daimon temporarily gains 20% of the enemy target's Attack Rating and 30% of their Defense Rating. This ability cannot be stacked
si.lv10: Daimon permanently acquires the target's Attack and Defense ratings if the enemy's target dies while Daimon's "Blood Shield" is being used
si.lv20: After using the ability "Blood Shield", while the shield is still in use, Daimon temporarily gains 40% of the enemy target's Attack Rating and 60% of their Defense Rating. This ability cannot be stacked
si.lv30: Duration of "Blood Shield" lasts for 7 seconds

fn.lv3: Enemies that have already dealth damage to Daimon receive 40% increased damage for 3 seconds. This abiliy cannot be stacked
fn.lv9: Enemies that have already dealth damage to Daimon receive 60% increased damage for 6 seconds. This abiliy cannot be stacked. When Daimon dies, all of his allies receive a shield that is equal to 20% of his max health for 5 seconds

si.desc: It had been her father's, and it was her most prized possession. The weapon that he had given her was more than just a gift. With it came the weight of her vow to carry out her father's last wish
si.lv0: Stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds and sends them hurtling into the air whenever a Normal Attack deals a Critical Damage
si.lv10: Frequency of Normal Attacks is raised by 20% in battle
si.lv20: Frequency of Normal Attacks is raised by 40% in battle
si.lv30: Stun effect lasts for 3 seconds

fn.lv3: Nakoruru's "Kamui Mutsube" ability is triggered each time she collectively loses 30% of her max health. This ability can be used up to 3 times per battle
fn.lv9: Nakoruru's "Kamui Mutsube" ability is triggered each time she collectively loses 30% of her max health. This ability can be used up to 5 times per battle

si.desc: The legendary sword of King Arthur that was returned to him by the Lady of the Lake. It possesses an immense power that can only be wielded by The One True King
si.lv0: Arthur rallies his team, raising the attack frequency of normal attacks for all allies standing behind Arthur by 50%
si.lv10: Arthur rallies his team, raising the Crit Rating for all allies standing behind Arthur by 15%
si.lv20: Arthur rallies his team, raising the Crit Rating for all allies standing behind Arthur by 30%
si.lv30: Arthur will recovers 5% of his max health every second when there are two or more rallied allies on the battlefield

fn.lv3: After Arthur uses his ultimate ability "Smite", if any of his non-summoned allies (including himself) are dealt fatal damage, this ability will be triggered. The affected ally becomes immune to all of the fatal damage that was required to trigger this ability and also receives a shield that lasts for 5 seconds, which is able to offset damage equal to 35% of Arhtur's max health. This ability may only be triggered once per battle
fn.lv9: Shield now lasts for 10 seconds, and can offsset damage equal to 45% of Arthur's max health

si.desc: Ukyo Tachibana's self-crafted, unamed sword. Simple and unadorned. Shinmusou Ittou Ryu
si.lv0: This ability can be used once per battle. After using his ultimate ability, Ukyo will be immune to all control abilites for 8 seconds, his Attack Rating will be increased by 20% and his Life Leech attribute will be increased by 10 points
si.lv10: Ukyo's Attack Rating is increased by 30% and his Life Leech attribute is increased by 25 points
si.lv20: Ukyo's Attack Rating is increased by 40% and his Life Leech attribute is increased by 40 points
si.lv30: Ukyo can use this ability up to 3 times per battle

fn.lv3: Ukyo's Attack Rating is increased by 6% each time he deals damage to an enemy. This ability can be stacked up to 6 times. If an enemy dodges, mitigates or is immune to one of Ukyo's attacks, he will lose 3 layers of his increased Attack Rating
fn.lv9: Ability can be stacked up to 15 times

si.desc: Through studying pages from Altair's codex, Leonardo da Vinci was able to provide Ezio an upgraded Hidden Blade. As a symbol of the Assassin, Ezio will use the Hidden Blade until the end of his career
si.lv0: Each time Ezio defeats an enemy, all holds enemies marked with 'Execution Threshold' markers have their thresholds raised by 50% for the following 10 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked
si.lv10: Each time Ezio defeats an enemy he receives 35% less damage from enemies for 10 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked
si.lv20: Each time Ezio defeats an enemy he receives 55% less damage from enemies for 10 seconds. This ability cannot be stacked
si.lv30: Each time Ezio defeats an enemy his "Smoke Bomb" ability is triggered

fn.lv3: All negative control abilities are removed from Ezio whenever a deadly strike is dealt to an enemy as a result of his "Eagle Vision" ability
fn.lv9: Ezio gains 500 Energy points at the beginning of battles
